enableCardHistoryDateRangeSearch.description: Enables/Disables the ability to use the date range field to search through credit card history

shouldSetPendingTransactionAmountAsNeutr.description: If true, card transactions that are Pending will be displayed as neutral (black and positive)

ssoConfigId.description: Configuration ID in the SSOConfig table for PSCU SSO

usePscuSsoUrl.description: If true, get Pscu Sso URl instead of EZCardInfo

apiBaseUrl.description: Base Url for use with the Fiserv API Card History

tokenCreateApiEndpoint.description: API Endpoint for use with Fiserv Card History API. Use this API endpoint to get a security token

statementDetailsApiEndpoint.description: API Endpoint for use with Fiserv Card History API. Use this API endpoint to get card transactions

customerInquiryApiEndpoint.description: API Endpoint for use with Fiserv Card History API. Use this API endpoint to get customer details (credit limit, current balance, etc)

userId.description: UserId used with the Fiserv Card History API

password.description: Password used with the Fiserv Card History API

x500Id.description: An Id used with Fiserv Card History API

certificateStore.description: Certificate Store location of Fiserv API certificate

debugModeEnabled.description: When enabled, will run the Fiserv Card History API in debug mode

cycle.description: The cycle type for Fiserv card history
